Hello!

from Scandinavia.
Oh, yeah.
This, of course...

And Finland, of course...

Finland, of course, is home

they're all men.
All of them.

Are there any famous

Finnish people?

Nobody thinks so.
They're all...

It's because all Finnish
women, at the age of 19,

move to England
to be au pairs.

au pairs over the years
for my children.

-Did you?
-Yeah. It was always funny.
